author: Joseph Choi -
title: Cheney challenger wins Wyoming Republican activists' straw poll

sentence: Wyoming Republican Harriet Hageman, endorsed by former President Donald Trump, showed a commanding lead against the Democrat-allied Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) in a Saturday straw poll full of House candidates held by the Wyoming Republican State Central Committee.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Liz Cheney Loses Wyoming Straw Poll to Trump-Backed Harriet Hageman

sentence: The $7.2 million raised to date by Cheney is already a record for Wyoming's sole House district, and has given her a big financial edge over her main challenger, land-use lawyer Harriet Hageman, who has pulled in $745,000.
author: Nathan Layne
title: Surge of out-of-state donors boost Trump critic Cheney's campaign -but cannot vote for her

sentence: The $7.2 million raised to date by Cheney is already a record for Wyoming's sole House district, and has given her a big financial edge over her main challenger, land-use lawyer Harriet Hageman, who has pulled in $745,000.
author: Nathan Layne
title: Surge Of Out-of-state Donors Boost Trump Critic Cheney's Campaign -but Cannot Vote For Her

sentence: The GOP leader's decision to wade into the primary battle and support the Trump-endorsed Harriet Hageman marks a departure from the status quo of top party leaders protecting their incumbents.
title: McCarthy picks his path on Cheney: Try to boot her from Congress

sentence: WASHINGTON House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., on Thursday endorsed Harriet Hageman, a primary challenger to GOP Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, the latest skirmish between Cheney and her party over her forceful criticism of former President Donald Trump.
author: Dylan Wells
title: House GOP leader Kevin McCarthy endorses Liz Cheney challenger in continuing fallout over Trump

sentence: Mr. McCarthy said he was backing Harriet Hageman, a pro-Trump candidate who has repeated the former president's false claims that the 2020 presidential election was stolen, in a race that has become a prominent test for the Republican Party.
title: Kevin McCarthy Backs Liz Cheney's Challenger, Escalating a Party Feud

sentence: House Republican Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy has endorsed Congresswoman Liz Cheney's primary challenger in Wyoming, trial attorney Harriet Hageman.
author: Robert Costa
title: House GOP Leader Kevin McCarthy backs Liz Cheney's primary challenger Harriet Hageman

sentence: McCarthy has thrown his political weight behind Harriet Hageman, a Trump-backed congressional candidate who is challenging Cheney in Wyoming -- an endorsement that earned him plaudits on the right, a key constituency in a potential future bid for the speaker's gavel.
author: Melanie Zanona
title: McCarthy calls endorsement of Cheney's primary foe a 'special case'
